analyzed: tshogs dang bral ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag ni sbyin pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig /

original: bsod nams dang bral zhing mtho ris kyi bde ba 'tshal ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig /
analyzed: bsod nams dang bral zhing mtho ris kyi bde ba 'tshal ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig /

original: gcig la gcig 'jig pa dang / rnyog pa'i sems dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni byams pa brjod pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig /

original: gzugs dang gzugs ma mchis pa'i dregs pas myos pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni btang snyoms brjod pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig /

original: theg pa chen po pa'i sems can rgod pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni dbugs 'byung ba dang rdub pa dran pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig /

analyzed: shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyis ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pas chos ston par 'tshal par gyur cig /

analyzed: lta ba ngan pa nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig /

analyzed: rnam par rtog pa kun tu spyod pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig /

translated: Those who do not understand virtue, the levels, and wisdom will express the nondelusion.üîΩThose who are content with other roots of virtue will express the hearing.üîΩThose who are not of equal mind to each other will express the unobstructed light rays.

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis chog par 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni thos pa brjod pa dang / gcig la gcig sems mi mnyam pa rnams kyis ni 'od zer thogs pa me dpa brjod pa dang / las dga' ba la yang dag @370b par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni bya ba la 'jug pa brjod pa dang /

analyzed: 'khor gyis 'jigs par gyur pa rnams kyis ni seng ge'i rtogs pa brjod pa dang / bdud bzhis zil gyis non pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dpa' ba brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni 'od bkod pa brjod pa dang /
translated: Those who are afraid of retinues should listen to the story of the lion. Those whose minds are overwhelmed by the four maras should listen to the story of the hero. Those beings in buddha realms who are not illuminated should listen to the story of the array of light.

analyzed: rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba rnams kyis ni ri bo'i phung po brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang bas zil gyis non pa rnams kyis ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan brjod pa dang / shes rab chen po dang bral ba rnams kyis ni sgron ma dang ldan pa brjod pa dang /
translated: Those who are attached and hostile should listen to the story of the mountain heap. analyzed: gti mug gi mun par mchis pa rnams kyis ni nyi ma'i sgron ma brjod pa dang / zad pa'i nges pa'i tshig la brtson pa rnams kyis ni yon tan 'byung gnas brjod pa dang / bdag la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni sred med kyi bu brjod pa dang /
translated: Those who perceive themselves as being like a lump of foam should be taught the Son of NƒÅrƒÅya·πáa.üîΩThose who are fickle-minded should be taught the One with a Core.üîΩThose who look to the crown of the head should be taught the Banner of Meru.

analyzed: blo g-yo zhing 'gyur ba rnams kyis ni snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / spyi gtsug bltar gda' ba rnams kyis ni lhun po'i rgyal mtshan brjod pa dang / sngon gyi dam bcas pa bor ba rnams kyis ni snying po can brjod pa dang /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i snying po brjod pa dang / chos thams cad smon pa rnams kyis @371a *//

translated: Those who know the supreme and non-supreme faculties should speak of the lamp of wisdom.üîΩThose who do not know how to speak to each other should speak of engaging in sound.üîΩThose who have attained the dharmakaya should speak of the cultivation of the assembly of the sublime dharma.

original: phan tshun du tshig brjod pa ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni sgra la 'jug pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi sku thob pa rnams kyis ni dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsgom pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang bral ba rnams kyis ni mig mi 'dzum pa brjod pa dang /
analyzed: phan tshun du tshig brjod pa ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni sgra la 'jug pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi sku thob pa rnams kyis ni dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsgom pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang bral ba rnams kyis ni mig mi 'dzum pa brjod pa dang /
translated: Those who are separated from seeing the tathagatas should speak of the unblinking eye.

analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni dgon pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bskor bar 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni 'khor lo dri ma med pa brjod pa dang / rgyu ma mchis pa'i rig pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni rig pa la brten pa'i rjes su mthun pa brjod pa dang /
translated: For those who are disturbed by all objects of meditation, it is the description of the forest. For those who are engaged in the knowledge of the absence of causes, it is the description of the concordant support of knowledge.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig pu ther zug tu blta ba rnams kyi sa ni legs par bgyid pa rnam par 'byed pa brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad kyi sa bon bskrun pa rnams kyis ni rgyan dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / tshig dang sgra rab tu 'byed par rngo mi thogs pa rnams kyis ni so sor bsgrub pa brjod pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig pu ther zug tu blta ba rnams kyi sa ni legs par bgyid pa rnam par 'byed pa brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad kyi sa bon bskrun pa rnams kyis ni rgyan dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / tshig dang sgra rab tu 'byed par rngo mi thogs pa rnams kyis ni so sor bsgrub pa brjod pa dang /
translated: For those who view the buddha realm as a single, permanent entity, it is the description of the analysis of good deeds. For those who have planted the seeds of the major and minor marks, it is the description of the possession of ornaments. For those who are unable to distinguish words and sounds, it is the description of the individual accomplishments.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni chos kyi dbyings @371b rnam par 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la yang dang yang du 'jug pa rnams kyis ni brtan pa brjod pa dang /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni chos kyi dbyings @371b rnam par 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la yang dang yang du 'jug pa rnams kyis ni brtan pa brjod pa dang /
translated: Those who have realized omniscient wisdom will describe the realm of phenomena as being without disturbance.üîΩThose who repeatedly engage with present phenomena will describe it as being stable.

original: chos kyi dbyings rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyi sa ni mngon par shes pa brjod pa dang / shes rab spangs pa rnams kyis ni nyams pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / lam rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyi sa ni mngon par shes pa brjod pa dang / shes rab spangs pa rnams kyis ni nyams pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / lam rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /
translated: Those who understand the realm of phenomena will describe it as being supernormal knowledge. Those who have abandoned wisdom will describe it as being without decline. Those who are disturbed by the path will describe it as being unchanging.

original: nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni ci'ang ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni yongs su dag pa la rab tu 'god pa brjod pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni shin tu yang dag par gzung ba brjod pa dang /
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni ci'ang ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni yongs su dag pa la rab tu 'god pa brjod pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni shin tu yang dag par gzung ba brjod pa dang /
translated: those who have not perfected the means of attracting others speak of the perfect retention,üîΩthose who seek the brahmavihƒÅras speak of the equality of application,üîΩthose who have not perfected the precious factors of enlightenment speak of the definite emergence through stability,

original: tshangs pa'i gnas pa 'tshol ba rnams kyis ni sbyor ba mnyam pa brjod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rin po che yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni rnam par gnas pas nges par 'byung ba brjod pa dang / shes pa ma bsgoms shing rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya brjod pa dang /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas pa 'tshol ba rnams kyis ni sbyor ba mnyam pa brjod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rin po che yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni rnam par gnas pas nges par 'byung ba brjod pa dang / shes pa ma bsgoms shing rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya brjod pa dang /
translated: those who have not cultivated knowledge and have a hostile mind speak of the seal of the ocean,

original: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la ngo mtshar du sems pa rnams kyis ni sems ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni bskyud pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la ngo mtshar du sems pa rnams kyis ni sems ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni bskyud pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang /
translated: Those who have a mind that is completely lost in the Dharma as they have heard it should speak of the absence of loss.

original: phan tshun legs par smras pa la mi dga' ba rnams kyis @372a *//
analyzed: phan tshun legs par smras pa la mi dga' ba rnams kyis @372a *//
